description:
Take your camp coffee game to the next level. The Hydro Flask Coffee Mug is made from 18/8 stainless stee to ensure yesterday's hazelnut latte doesn't taint today's americano. The double-walled insulation keeps your coffee hot for hours and the insulated lid ensures you don't lose any over the lip.

  • Made with 18/8 food-grade stainless steel TempShield™ double-walled vacuum insulation to keep your coffee hot for hours
  • Tough powder-coated finish is grippy and super scratch-resistant
  • Press-in lid is insulated and slosh-resistant so your coffee stays contained
  • Dimensions: 12.7 x 11.4cm
name: Hydro Flask Mug 355ml
